item.description:
Please Update your RSVPs and answer to the ticket purchase question for this event. You must purchase your ticket from Boston Uncorked in advance.

This is one of the best parties and wine tastings of the year outside on one of the longest days of the year. I rarely miss it. Purchase your $45.00 ticket now to reserve your evening.

There is Summer Solstice: the date in late June marking the first official day of summer and the years longest day of sun light. And there is Summer Solstice: the much anticipated annual Boston Uncorked roof deck wine soiree. Each celebrate the other.

Join Boston Uncorked for a sun and fun filled evening of fine wine, food and music at the Summer Solstice 8th Annual Roof Deck Wine Tasting at The Sports Club LA Roof Deck on Wednesday, June 20 from 6:45pm to 9pm. Sample over 25 fine wines from producers all across the globe, paired with delectable bites atop one of the city's hottest roof deck venues.

Check In is 6:45pm. Event moves indoors if inclement weather. No Check In after 7:45pm. One must attend to experience. For more information about the event please go to www.bostonuncorked.com. Yes RSVPs who have not purchased tickets to the event will be changed to no. Arrive early and take the MBTA if you can. 

To purchase your ticket go to www.bostonuncorked.com . Please do not call or contact the Sports Club LA.

MBTA - Green Line Boylston Street stop or Orange Line China Town stop

Car - Building Parking Garage entrance off Boylston/Essex Streets between Tremont and Washington Streets

or The Boston Common Garage

Valet - 4 Avery street at Ritz Carlton Hotel

A bunch of members from the red sox natives meetup will be joining us.

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Yes RSVPs who have purchased tickets will be E Mailed the day before the event. Meet early in the upstairs lobby of the health club.
item.name: Boston Uncorked Summer Solstice 8th Annual Roof Deck Wine Tasting Sports Club LA
